name: Petra Kušen
about: Team captain and strategist. Played for 4 years and leads by example both on and off the field.
quote: In rugby, we don't just play together - we grow together.
funFact: Speaks four languages and uses rugby terms to teach Croatian to international players!

name: Josipa Farac
about: Speed demon on the wing with exceptional footwork and game awareness.
quote: Speed kills, but teamwork wins championships.
funFact: Holds the team record for most tries scored in a single season!

name: Teuta Stazić
quote: Rugby taught me that strength comes from the team, not just yourself.
funFact: Started playing to overcome her fear of contact sports - now she's unstoppable!

name: Margaux Fabre
quote: Each pass carries more than a ball - it carries trust, courage, and the will to move forward.
funFact: I come from France, a land where rugby runs deep but it was in Croatia that I first laced up my cleats.

name: Manuela Andrijanić
quote: When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
funFact: Never missed a lineout throw in her two years with the team!

name: Dina Madir
about: Powerful runner with soft hands and an eye for the gap. Defensive stalwart in midfield.
quote: Attack wins games, but defense wins championships.
funFact: Former handball player who brings incredible hand-eye coordination to rugby!

name: Lea Kolarić
about: Barber with a heart of gold and a smile that will light up your day.
quote: Nothing in life has happened by accident.
funFact: I keep saying I don’t feel like doing anything, yet I still get everything done

name: Lara Vuk
quote: Rugby taught me more about life than school ever could.
funFact: Before rugby, I trained kickboxing, and in my free time, I go on adventures with my dogs.

name: Gabriell Martinović
about: Dynamic runner with powerful carries and defensive presence in midfield.
quote: Rugby is about making space for others and taking yours when it comes.
funFact: Multilingual player who helps integrate international teammates.

name: Macarena Cámara
about: Lightning-fast finisher with safe hands under pressure. Scores tries that seem impossible.
quote: Speed gets you there, but composure gets you over the line.
funFact: Former gymnast whose flexibility allows her to score tries from impossible angles!

name: Morena Ivček
about: Lightning-fast finisher with safe hands under pressure. Scores tries that seem impossible.
quote: Speed gets you there, but composure gets you over the line.
funFact: Former gymnast whose flexibility allows her to score tries from impossible angles!

name: Ivona Šojić
about: Back row powerhouse with leadership qualities and an engine that never stops.
quote: Lead from the front, support from behind, never give up.
funFact: Runs 10km every morning before training - her fitness is legendary!

name: Lana Emanović
about: Solid scrummager with powerful driving game in open play.
quote: Scrums are won with heart, not just muscle.
funFact: Former powerlifter who brings incredible strength to the scrum.

name: Cvita Seiter
about: Explosive winger with great footwork and finishing ability.
quote: Every time I touch the ball, I'm looking for the try line.
funFact: Scored a hat-trick in her debut match!

name: Lucija Zorić
about: Creative playmaker with silky skills and perfect game management.
quote: Rugby is an art, and every play is a brushstroke.
funFact: Known for her exceptional passing game and ability to read defenses.

name: Lora Aladrović
about: Precision thrower and fierce competitor who leads the front row with passion.
quote: Accuracy under pressure is what separates good players from great ones.
funFact: Has a 95% lineout throwing accuracy - the highest in the league!

name: Barbara Debeljak
about: Versatile forward who brings energy and intensity to every breakdown.
quote: Winning starts with attitude and ends with effort.
funFact: Former basketball player who brings exceptional athleticism to rugby.

name: Jelena Ivančić
about: Lineout specialist with incredible athleticism. The engine room of our forward pack.
quote: Every lineout is a chance to show the opposition what we're made of.
funFact: Former volleyball player whose jumping reach is unmatched in the league!
